translations: 戈尔根朱勒干酪（因产自意大利米兰附近的戈尔根朱勒村而得名）

sentences.sentence: The snob appeal may strengthen should the CPA persuade the European Union to afford pasties the “protected geographical status” enjoyed by, for example, Gorgonzola cheese and Prosciutto ham.
sentences.translation: 对高档顾客的吸引力有可能会变强，康沃尔馅饼协会应当劝说欧盟来提供诸如戈尔根朱勒干酪和意大利熏火腿已经享受的“地区保护特性”。
